ValidationRule.description: This requires an office account be selected in order to submit for approval.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Pending Approval"),ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Under Review"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Void Requested")), ISBLANK( Office_Account__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must select an office account to submit for approval.
